name: walk_transit_and_bike_scores
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zillow.
Tool description: Fast and highly available API. For-sale, rental listings and agens real-time data from Zillow.
API description: Fetches Walk, Transit, and Bike Scores for a property using the given ZPID.

zpid.description: The Zillow Property ID for which the scores are to be fetched. Default is '20485700'.
